fixes.name: Attrition Rate
fixes.dax_expression: SUM('HR data (HR Data)'[Attrition Count]) / SUM('HR data (HR Data)'[Employee Count])
fixes.solution_explanation: Translated the Tableau expression SUM([Attrition Count]) / SUM([Employee Count]) to DAX by applying SUM to the corresponding table columns. 'Attrition Count' is a calculated field in the same table and is referenced as 'HR data (HR Data)'[Attrition Count]. The expression returns the ratio of the two aggregated sums.
fixes.type_changed_reason: This calculation uses aggregation (SUM), so it should be created as a measure.
